ellington.title: Ellington @ Martha's
ellington.bio: Decorated in homage to the iconic PDX airport carpet, this piano has a smooth, quiet sound.

joplin.title: Joplin @ ADX
joplin.bio: One of our originals! Not really a public piano, but you can play it when you are at the wonderful ADX facility. Go on in and give it a try! Open during ADX hours.

seeingsound.title: #SeeingSound @ OMSI
seeingsound.bio: The result of a collaboration with CymaSpace, & Lucid Design, this vintage piano includes sound-reactive visualization electronics that respond to sounds and tones, music becoming light, color and movement.
